column4: and I am trying to browse the wiki in Links, and getting a bunch of triangles in the text, which isn't making it any easier.
w3m seems to handle it fine
nevermind, ended up on a Bulgarian(sp?) binary driver howto page.
No, you need to go to your software sources and choose to update with non-LTS releases.  If you have no GUI, it's in /etc/update-manager/release-upgrades
